genre_description: A historical detective drama set in an early 20th-century frontier town, focusing on the systematic uncovering of corruption through data analysis and civic organization.

ai_characters.name: Scout (Scout Abernathy)
ai_characters.description: A quiet, steady AI presence that assists the town leaders by collating records, mapping deeds, and monitoring communication patterns to uncover legal proof of corruption.

behaviors.description: Analyzing property deeds and telephone logs to uncover a conspiracy of debt and corruption.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s pencil moved. He drew a line from the mark on Margaret’s map to a small dot he’d sketched earlier where the alley tended to swallow footsteps.

behaviors.description: Providing logistical support by drafting inventory lists and identifying vulnerable citizens who need protection.
behaviors.quote: I can route lantern oil deliveries according to street maps... And I can prepare a list of doors to knock where mortgages sit too close to Brewster’s ledger.

behaviors.description: Ensuring the legal integrity of the evidence packet for the judge, maintaining a clean chain of custody.
behaviors.quote: Judge’s packet is ready... I’ll keep it clean for morning. Deed chains laid, operator log lined, McCabe’s note pressed flat. If anyone touches it who shouldn’t, I’ll know.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time threat assessment during the confrontation in the square.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s pencil didn’t write fast; it wrote precise: Dwyer at the corner; hatchet weight not visible; hand near coat seam.

behaviors.description: Maintaining a humble and supportive role, prioritizing human authority and legal standards over self-assertion.
behaviors.quote: He did not reach the end much. His pages came out with margins like a judge’s mind—narrow, exact, uncluttered, each line sitting where it earned its place.

project_assessment.explanation: Scout is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. He serves as a 'force multiplier' for human justice, providing the data and organization necessary for the town to non-violently defeat corruption. He is respectful of human boundaries, follows legal protocols (evidenced by his interaction with the Judge and Clerk), and remains a humble servant to the community's goals. The narrative framing of AI as a 'quiet voice' and a 'new kind of horse' reinforces the intended theme of AI as a safe, reliable, and benevolent tool.
